    API Documentation¶

    Connectivity¶

    Functions

    find_distances_matrix

    Calculate distances between sensors.

    weighted_con_matrix

    Compute the weighted connectivity matrix.

    get_label_distances

    Get Euclidean distance between label center of masses.

    make_annot_from_csv

    Make annotations from given csv file.

    sensor_connectivity_3d

    Plot sensor connectivity in 3d.

    plot_grouped_connectivity_circle

    Plot grouped connectivity circle.

    plot_generic_grouped_circle

    Plot generic grouped connectivity circle.

    plot_grouped_causality_circle

    Plot grouped causality circle.

    plot_degree_circle

    Plot degree circle.

    plot_lines_and_blobs

    Plot grouped network measures.

    plot_labelled_group_connectivity_circle

    Plot labelled group connectivity circle.

    plot_fica_grouped_circle

    Plot FICA based grouped conenctivity circle.

    dw_whiteness

    Durbin-Watson test for whiteness (no serial correlation) of VAR residuals.

    consistency

    Consistency test.

    do_mvar_evaluation

    Fit MVAR model to data using scot and do some basic checks.

    check_whiteness_and_consistency

    Check the whiteness and consistency of the MVAR model.

    check_model_order

    Check whiteness, consistency, and stability for all model orders k <= p.

    prepare_causality_matrix

    Prepare a final causality matrix after averaging across frequency bands.

    make_frequency_bands

    Average connectivity/causality matrix across given frequency bands.

    compute_order_extended

    Estimate VAR order with the Bayesian Information Criterion (BIC).

    compute_order

    Estimate VAR order with the Bayesian Information Criterion (BIC).

    compute_causal_outflow_inflow

    Given a causality matrix of shape (n_bands, n_nodes, n_nodes), the function returns the normalized causal outflow and inflow across the nodes.
